## Spark

**Spark is a generator of pretty little graphs called sparklines, which shows GitHub stars velocity of a repo.**

[![ref-repo]](https://github.com/antonmedv/spark)
[![ref-online-tool]](https://stars.medv.io/)

> [!Warning]
> This service is based on Github API, and there are request limits. Use it with caution.

### Parameters

<details >
<summary><small>Click to show/close parameters</small></summary><p></p>

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description | More Description |
| -------------------- | -------------------- | ------------------------ | ----------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------- |
| ![ref-params] | | | | | |
| `owner` | `string` | `true` |  | Github username |  |
| `repo` | `string` | `true` |  | Github repository name |  |

</details>

```txt
https://stars.medv.io/{owner}/{repo}.svg
```

<p align="right"><a href="#readme-top"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Back%20to%20top-555555?style=for-the-badge"></a></p>

### Examples

```markdown
<!-- antonmedv/spark -->
![Star Sparkline](https://stars.medv.io/antonmedv/spark.svg)
```
